item.title: Bumble 将在全球裁员 30
item.description: 约会应用 Bumble 周三表示，它将裁员约 240 人，占全球员工总数的 30%。【原文：Dating application Bumble said on Wednesday it will lay off about 240 roles or 30% of its global staff.】

item.title: 美联储鲍威尔前往参议院小组第二天作证
item.description: 美国联邦储备委员会主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）周三将在参议院银行委员会继续为期两天的国会作证，前一天他在众议院的一个小组会议上重点阐述了美联储对特朗普政府关税计划将提高通胀率的担忧。【原文：U.S. Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell resumes two days of Congressional testimony on Wednesday when he appears before the Senate Banking committee after scrutiny before a House panel the day before that focused on the Fed's concerns the Trump administration's tariff plans will raise inflation.】

item.title: 美国议员提出法案，禁止中国人工智能进入美国政府机构
item.description: 一个由两党议员组成的美国议员团体周三计划在国会参众两院提出一项法案，禁止美国行政机构使用中国开发的人工智能模型，包括来自 DeepSeek 的模型。【原文：A bipartisan group of U.S. lawmakers on Wednesday planned to introduce a bill in both houses of Congress that would bar U.S. executive agencies from using artificial intelligence models developed in China, including those from DeepSeek.】

item.title: 五月投资者重返美国长期债券基金
item.description: 5 月份，美国长期债券基金吸引了大量资金流入，扭转了 4 月份的萎缩态势，表明投资者在权衡贸易关税、通胀和财政赤字等一系列不确定性因素后，寻求高收益债务的安全性。【原文：U.S. long-term bond funds drew massive inflows in May, reversing April's drawdown and indicating investors sought the safety of higher-yielding debt, as they weighed a host of uncertainties around trade tariffs, inflation and fiscal deficits.】

item.title: 金融时报》报道：布鲁塞尔将无视欧洲央行关于稳定币规则的警告
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周三报道，尽管欧洲中央银行（ECB）警告称，拟议的标准可能会在市场波动期间破坏该地区银行的稳定，但欧盟委员会仍将在未来几天内宣布针对快速增长的稳定币市场的新规则。【原文：The European Commission is set to announce new rules for the fast-growing stablecoin market in the coming days, despite warnings from the European Central Bank (ECB) that the proposed standards could destabilise the region's banks during periods of market volatility, the Financial Times reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 通用磨坊因宏观经济不确定性预测年度利润下滑
item.description: 通用磨坊公司（General Mills）周三预测年度利润低于预期，原因是在关税驱动、宏观经济不确定的背景下，美国市场对其冷藏烘焙食品和零食的需求疲软。【原文：General Mills forecast annual profit below expectations on Wednesday, as the Pillsbury-owner was weighed by weak demand for its refrigerated baked goods and snacks in the U.S. in a tariff-driven, uncertain macroeconomic background.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦称与美国的贸易谈判将于下周结束
item.description: 巴基斯坦财政部长穆罕默德-奥朗泽布（Muhammad Aurangzeb）和美国商务部长霍华德-卢特尼克（Howard Lutnick）周三会晤后表示，巴基斯坦和美国决心在下周结束贸易谈判。【原文：Pakistan and the U.S. have resolved to conclude trade talks next week, the South Asian nation said on Wednesday after a meeting between its Finance Minister Muhammad Aurangzeb and U.S. Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick.】

item.title: 巴宝莉股价上涨，经纪公司预测业绩将恢复性增长
item.description: 巴宝莉（Burberry）股价周三上涨，原因是在 7 月 18 日发布第一季度交易报告之前，券商对这家英国奢侈品牌的看法相对乐观。【原文：Burberry shares rose on Wednesday as brokerages turned relatively upbeat on the British luxury brand before its first quarter trading statement on July 18.】

item.title: 早间竞价：美联储加息押注飙升，石油市场趋于平静
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 分析人士称，特朗普的预算计划将财富从年轻人手中转移到老年人手中
item.description: 无党派分析人士表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的全面减税法案将有效地把财富从年轻一代美国人手中转移到老一代人手中。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's sweeping tax-cut legislation would effectively transfer wealth from younger Americans to older generations, nonpartisan analysts say.】

item.title: 中东紧张局势降温，美股期货低迷；鲍威尔成为焦点
item.description: 由于以色列和伊朗发出空战已经结束的信号，也由于投资者在等待美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔发表更多评论，纳斯达克 100 指数在前一天创下收盘纪录新高后，周三美股期货表现低迷。【原文：U.S. stock futures were subdued on Wednesday, after the Nasdaq 100 closed at a record high a day earlier on Israel and Iran signaling their air war had ended, and as investors awaited more comments from Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell.】

item.title: 独家报道美国交易所和证交会正在商谈放宽上市公司监管条例
item.description: 据四位熟悉内情的人士透露，美国交易所运营商正在与美国证券交易委员会（Securities and Exchanges Commission）商谈减轻上市公司监管负担的事宜，以鼓励更多估值丰厚的初创企业上市。【原文：U.S. exchange operators are in talks with the Securities and Exchanges Commission on easing regulatory burdens for public companies, as they seek to encourage more richly valued startups to list, according to four people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）的 "野孩子 "阿根廷寻求外汇储备缺失豁免--很可能会如愿以偿
item.description: 阿根廷是国际货币基金组织（IMF）的长期问题儿童和最大的债务国，它再次需要寻求宽恕：这一次是因为没有达到与 200 亿美元新协议相关的外汇储备增加目标。【原文：Argentina, the International Monetary Fund's long-term problem child and biggest debtor, once again needs to seek forgiveness: this time for falling short on foreign currency reserve build-up targets linked to a new $20 billion deal.】

item.title: 帕兰提尔的突飞猛进将在罗素大洗牌中留下印记
item.description: 帕兰提尔科技公司（Palantir Technologies）股价的暴涨很可能会在周五富时罗素指数（FTSE Russell）对其基准指数的最终重组中留下印记，届时投资者可望在收盘前看到巨大的交易量。【原文：A meteoric rally in shares of Palantir Technologies is likely to leave its imprint on the final reconstitution by FTSE Russell of its benchmark indexes on Friday, when investors can expect a crush of trading volume heading into the closing bell.】

item.title: Gartner 表示，到 2027 年将有超过 40% 的人工智能代理项目被取消
item.description: 根据 Gartner 的一份报告，到 2027 年底，将有超过 40% 的代理人工智能项目因成本上升和商业价值不明而被取消。【原文：More than 40% of agentic artificial intelligence projects will be canceled by the end of 2027 due to escalating costs and unclear business value, according to a report by Gartner.】

item.title: 美联储开始放宽银行杠杆率规定
item.description: 美联储将于周三召开会议，推进一项放宽银行杠杆率规定的提案，这将使银行业获得他们长期以来寻求的胜利，他们称这将有助于大公司促进国债市场交易。【原文：The Federal Reserve meets on Wednesday to advance a proposal that would ease leverage rules for banks, which would grant the industry a long-sought win they say will help big firms facilitate Treasury market trading.】

item.title: 贸易动荡影响需求和利润预期，联邦快递股价下滑
item.description: 联邦快递股价在周三的盘前交易中下跌近6%，此前这家物流巨头对未来一年的业绩持谨慎态度，并预测当前季度的盈利低于市场预期，因为该公司正在与美国关税压力导致的全球需求波动作斗争。【原文：FedEx shares dropped nearly 6% in premarket trading on Wednesday after the logistics giant sounded caution for the full year ahead and forecast current-quarter earnings below market expectations, as it battles volatile global demand due to pressures from U.S. tariffs.】

item.title: 博世首席执行官警告欧洲不要 "自寻死路 "地监管人工智能
item.description: 博世（ROBG.UL）首席执行官斯特凡-哈同（Stefan Hartung）周三警告说，与世界其他地区相比，欧洲有可能因过度监管而阻碍其在人工智能领域取得进展。【原文：Bosch (ROBG.UL) CEO Stefan Hartung warned on Wednesday that Europe risks hindering its progress in artificial intelligence compared with other parts of the world through over-regulation.】

item.title: 德国航天初创企业 Isar Aerospace 获得 1.5 亿欧元基金支持
item.description: 德国太空初创企业伊萨尔宇航公司（Isar Aerospace）周三表示，该公司从一家美国投资公司获得了 1.5 亿欧元（1.73 亿美元）的资金。【原文：German space startup Isar Aerospace obtained 150 million euros ($173 million) in funding from an American investment company, it said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 媒体调查后，Worldline 股价下跌超过 20
item.description: 周三，Worldline 股价下跌超过 20%，因为 21 家欧洲媒体进行了调查，指控这家法国数字支付公司为保护收入而掩盖客户欺诈行为。【原文：Worldline shares fell over 20% on Wednesday after an investigation by 21 European media outlets alleged the French digital payments company covered up client fraud to protect revenue.】

item.title: 荷兰技术投资者 Prosus 致力于增加电子商务收入
item.description: 荷兰技术投资商 Prosus 在周三向投资者发布的一份报告中表示，该公司已设定了在 2026 财年实现电子商务业务收入 73 亿至 75 亿美元的目标。【原文：Dutch technology investor Prosus has set a target to achieve revenue from its e-commerce operations of $7.3-$7.5 billion in its 2026 financial year, it said in a presentation to investors on Wednesday.】

item.title: 澳大利亚监管机构称，加密货币 ATM 用户中最多的是欺诈受害者
item.description: 澳大利亚金融犯罪监测机构周三表示，在应对数字货币犯罪的努力中，该机构已经确定了90名诈骗受害者、钱骡和犯罪嫌疑人，他们是该国最主要的加密货币ATM用户。【原文：Australia's financial crimes monitoring agency said on Wednesday that it has identified 90 scam victims, money mules and suspected offenders as the top crypto ATM users in the country, amid efforts to address crimes enabled by digital currency.】

item.title: 独家报道消息称比亚迪放缓生产，推迟中国工厂产能扩张
item.description: 两位知情人士称，中国电动汽车冠军比亚迪最近几个月放慢了生产和扩张步伐，减少了中国一些工厂的班次，并推迟了增加新生产线的计划。【原文：Chinese electric vehicle champion BYD has slowed its production and expansion pace in recent months by reducing shifts at some factories in China and delaying plans to add new production lines, said two people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: Monte dei Paschi 称欧洲央行已批准 Mediobanca 收购案
item.description: 锡耶纳银行周三表示，欧洲中央银行已经批准了其收购竞争对手 Mediobanca 的提议，包括在其获得对手不到 50% 股份的情况下。【原文：Monte dei Paschi di Siena said on Wednesday the European Central Bank had approved its proposed acquisition of rival Mediobanca , including under a scenario in which it gains a stake of less than 50% in the rival.】

item.title: 尼尔森智库（NielsenIQ）称，网络攻击后 M&S 食品销售增长放缓
item.description: 周三的行业数据显示，英国零售商玛莎百货的食品业务在截至6月14日的12周内销售额同比增长放缓至9.1%，反映了4月份网络攻击后的混乱局面。【原文：British retailer Marks & Spencer's food business saw sales growth slow to 9.1% over the 12 weeks to June 14 year-on-year, reflecting the disruption that followed a cyberattack in April, industry data showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 澳大利亚羊肉出口激增，羊价再创新高
item.description: 全球对羊肉和羊羔肉的需求不断增长，推动了世界头号羊肉供应国的出口热潮，澳大利亚的养羊户正在从创纪录的高羊肉价格中套现。【原文：Australian sheep farmers are cashing in on record-high sheep prices, as rising global demand for lamb and mutton fuels a boom in exports from the world's top sheep meat supplier.】

item.title: 聚焦：耐克希望通过基普耶贡打破纪录，重新赢得女性跑步者的青睐
item.description: 耐克公司打赌，其帮助肯尼亚运动员费丝-基皮耶贡（Faith Kipyegon）在四分钟内跑完一英里的努力，将重新吸引那些一直在其他地方寻找跑步鞋和服装的女性消费者的注意。【原文：Nike is betting its endeavor to help Kenyan athlete Faith Kipyegon run a mile in under four minutes will recapture the attention of women consumers who have been looking elsewhere for running shoes and clothes.】

item.title: 德国出口景气受关税威胁打击，Ifo称
item.description: 据Ifo经济研究所的一项调查显示，由于美国关税的不确定性，德国出口商的情绪在6月份有所低落。【原文：The mood among German exporters darkened in June due to uncertainty regarding U.S. tariffs, according to a survey conducted by the Ifo economic institute.】

item.title: 据《纽约时报》报道，OpenAI 首席执行官奥特曼称已与微软首席执行官纳德拉谈过话
item.description: OpenAI首席执行官萨姆-奥特曼（Sam Altman）周一与微软首席执行官萨提亚-纳德拉（Satya Nadella）通了电话，讨论了他们未来的工作伙伴关系。【原文：OpenAI chief executive Sam Altman had a call with Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella on Monday and discussed their future working partnership, Altman said in a New York Times podcast on Tuesday.】

item.title: 早间竞标脆弱的停火对市场来说已经足够了
item.description: 凯文-巴克兰对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Kevin Buckland】
